metadata.title: Terms & Conditions
metadata.description: The commercial agreement that governs every Coello One purchase.

hero.title: Terms & Conditions
hero.subtitle: Ground rules for buying Coello One gear online or through our retail partners, crafted with Laura and reviewed by our Athlete Council.
summary: Benchmarked against Gymshark, Adidas, and Nike standards so expectations stay familiar across the industry.
Explains how we confirm orders, process payments, and dispatch from our EU fulfillment hubs.
Details the remedies, warranty windows, and escalation paths available to every athlete.

sections.title: Ordering & eligibility
paragraphs: You may place orders via coello.one, the Coello app, or sanctioned pop-ups. By ordering, you confirm that all account details are accurate and that you are purchasing for personal use, not bulk resale.

We reserve the right to refuse or limit quantities where fraud, abuse, or supply constraints are suspected. Any changes to your order (address, size, quantity) must be submitted within 2 hours via concierge support.

listItems.title: Age & residency
listItems.description: You must be 16+ and legally able to enter a binding contract in your territory.

listItems.title: Account identity
listItems.description: One verified account per athlete; duplicate accounts may be merged to protect launch fairness.

listItems.title: Communication
listItems.description: Keep an active email and SMS number on file so we can deliver confirmations and delivery alerts.

sections.title: Pricing, payment & currency
paragraphs: Prices are listed in GBP, EUR, or USD depending on your locale and already include applicable VAT or sales tax unless stated otherwise.
We capture payment once your items leave our warehouse. Pre-authorizations may appear on your statement to validate the card or wallet you used.

listItems.title: Cards & wallets
listItems.description: Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Klarna (where available).

listItems.title: Currency lock
listItems.description: The currency shown at checkout is the amount billed; your bank may add conversion fees.

listItems.title: Fraud monitoring
listItems.description: We partner with global risk tools that mirror Adidas/Nike safeguards; mismatched info can trigger manual review.

sections.title: Shipping & delivery
paragraphs: Orders ship from Barcelona or Porto within 1–2 business days. High-demand launches may extend processing to 5 days, in which case we will email an updated timeline.
Transit estimates are provided at checkout. Customs clearance, weather, or carrier disruptions are outside our control but we will advocate for you with the carrier.

listItems.title: Tracking
listItems.description: Every shipment receives a tracking link once the label prints.

listItems.title: Signature
listItems.description: Orders over £300/€300 require signature or ID verification to mirror premium-brand loss prevention.

listItems.title: Split shipments
listItems.description: We may split orders to keep timelines tight; you are only charged once shipping completes.

sections.title: Returns, exchanges & warranties
paragraphs: You have 30 days from delivery to initiate a return or size exchange, provided garments remain unwashed with hygiene seals intact.
Manufacturing defects reported within 24 months receive free repair or replacement, aligning with the durability guarantees used by leading sportswear houses.

listItems.title: Return shipping
listItems.description: Complimentary within the EU/UK; international athletes receive a prepaid label deducted from the refund.

listItems.title: Refund timing
listItems.description: Funds return within 5–10 business days after our quality inspection clears.

listItems.title: Residency limits
listItems.description: We cannot reimburse duties or taxes; consult your customs office for local recovery options.

sections.title: Liability & governing law
paragraphs: Coello One is not liable for indirect or consequential damages beyond the value of the product purchased, except where consumer law in your market provides additional mandatory rights.
Events beyond our reasonable control (force majeure) may delay performance; we will resume obligations immediately after such events.
These terms are governed by the laws of Spain, and disputes may be brought before the courts of Barcelona or your local consumer court where required.

contact.title: Need contract support?
contact.description: Reach our concierge inbox for priority handling of any contractual questions.

metadata.title: Privacy Notice
metadata.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

hero.title: Privacy Notice
hero.subtitle: We follow the privacy playbooks used by Gymshark, Adidas, and Nike and adapt them to Coello's boutique scale.
summary: Explains the data we collect when you browse, shop, or collaborate with Coello.
Describes the legal bases we rely on and the partners who help us operate.
Lists the rights you can exercise at any time, in any market we serve.

sections.title: Data we collect
paragraphs: We collect only what we need to serve athletes responsibly. Data sources mirror leading sportswear brands but on a reduced scale.
Providing certain data is optional, yet declining may limit specific experiences (for example, residency labs or tailored fit advice).

listItems.title: Account data
listItems.description: Name, email, password hashes, locale, marketing preferences.

listItems.title: Order data
listItems.description: Shipping addresses, billing tokens, VAT IDs, fulfillment history.

listItems.title: Engagement data
listItems.description: Device identifiers, cookie IDs, session analytics, and creative submissions.

listItems.title: Support data
listItems.description: Concierge transcripts, repair photos, athlete council applications.

sections.title: How we use data
paragraphs: We process your information to fulfill orders, personalize storytelling, secure our platforms, and comply with legal duties.
Automated decision-making is limited to fraud screening and personalization segments; humans can review any outcome on request.

listItems.title: Commerce
listItems.description: Process payments, shipping, returns, and warranty cases.

listItems.title: Experience
listItems.description: Localize content, remember preferences, and measure campaign performance.

listItems.title: Safety
listItems.description: Detect abuse, protect intellectual property, and maintain service reliability.

sections.title: Sharing & transfers
paragraphs: We do not sell your data. We share limited information with payment providers, logistics partners, analytics platforms, and legal advisors under contracts that mirror Adidas/Nike safeguards.
Data may move outside the EEA/UK; when it does, we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions.

listItems.title: Payments
listItems.description: Stripe, Adyen, or Klarna store sensitive card data on our behalf.

listItems.title: Fulfillment
listItems.description: DHL, UPS, and Correos receive delivery details only.

listItems.title: Analytics
listItems.description: Privacy-respecting platforms (PostHog, Segment) help us improve the product.

sections.title: Your rights
paragraphs: Depending on your residency, you may access, correct, delete, restrict, or port your data. We respond within 30 days, faster when feasible.
You can opt out of marketing at any time, withdraw consent for optional processing, or lodge a complaint with your local authority.

listItems.title: Self-service
listItems.description: Update preferences inside your account dashboard.

listItems.title: Concierge
listItems.description: Email us to action complex requests; we will verify identity before proceeding.

listItems.title: Supervisory body
listItems.description: Contact the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD) or your local regulator.

sections.title: Security & retention
paragraphs: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Access is limited to trained team members and approved vendors.
We retain account and order data for seven years to meet tax requirements, then anonymize or delete. Support media is purged after 24 months unless a repair case stays open.

contact.title: Privacy questions
contact.description: Reach our Data Protection desk for anything from subject access requests to partnership due diligence.

metadata.title: Terms of Use
metadata.description: Rules for using the Coello One digital platforms.

hero.title: Terms of Use
hero.subtitle: These terms align with digital conduct standards from Nike, Adidas, and Gymshark while reflecting Coello's creative community.
summary: Covers eligibility, account security, and responsible browsing.
Defines how community submissions, reviews, and collaborations are handled.
Clarifies intellectual property ownership and service disclaimers.

sections.title: Access & accounts
paragraphs: You may browse freely, but certain features require an account. Keep credentials confidential and notify us immediately of unauthorized use.
We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms, harm other athletes, or compromise security.

sections.title: Acceptable use
paragraphs: You agree not to misuse the site, interfere with infrastructure, mine data, or upload malicious code.
We enforce a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech, harassment, or imagery that conflicts with our athlete-safe ethos.

listItems.title: Automation abuse
listItems.description: Bots that scrape, resell, or bypass launch queues.

listItems.title: Security probing
listItems.description: Reverse engineering, vulnerability scanning, or credential stuffing.

listItems.title: Community harm
listItems.description: Posting defamatory, discriminatory, or infringing content.

sections.title: Community contributions
paragraphs: By submitting stories, reviews, or artwork, you grant Coello a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use that content for marketing, product development, and community programming.
You represent that you own or control the rights to anything you submit and that it does not infringe third-party rights.

sections.title: Intellectual property
paragraphs: All trademarks, graphics, copy, and code on this site belong to Coello One or its licensors. Inspired-by references to other brands do not imply affiliation.
You may not reuse, modify, or distribute site assets without written permission.

sections.title: Service updates & disclaimers
paragraphs: We may modify or discontinue features without notice to keep pace with creative experiments or compliance updates.
The site is provided "as is" to the fullest extent permitted by law; we disclaim implied warranties except where consumer statutes forbid such disclaimers.

contact.title: Questions about usage?
contact.description: Talk to our digital operations lead for clarifications on platform etiquette or collaborations.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy
metadata.description: How Coello One uses cookies and similar technologies.

hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.subtitle: Built with the same transparency benchmarks used by top global sports brands, adapted for Tailwind-powered Coello experiences.
summary: Explains the cookies and pixels we rely on.
Details how you can control preferences from any device.
Clarifies when third-party ad tech is involved and how we vet it.

sections.title: What are cookies?
paragraphs: Cookies are small files stored on your device to remember settings, keep sessions secure, and tailor content.
We also use equivalent technologies such as local storage, SDK events, and server-side tracking where it improves performance.

sections.title: Types of cookies we use
paragraphs: We categorize cookies similarly to Gymshark, Adidas, and Nike to keep consent dialogs familiar.

listItems.title: Essential
listItems.description: Required for checkout, authentication, and load balancing.

listItems.title: Performance
listItems.description: Help us measure traffic, debug issues, and benchmark component speed.

listItems.title: Functional
listItems.description: Store locale, bag contents, and accessibility preferences.

listItems.title: Marketing
listItems.description: Support opt-in campaigns, creator collaborations, or retargeting.

sections.title: Managing preferences
paragraphs: You can adjust cookie settings through our banner, your browser, or system-level controls. Revoking consent disables non-essential cookies while keeping the site usable.
Within the EU/UK we honor Global Privacy Control signals and IAB TCF strings where supported.

listItems.title: Banner
listItems.description: Use the "Manage preferences" link to toggle categories at any time.

listItems.title: Browser
listItems.description: Clear caches/cookies or use private browsing to reset identifiers.

listItems.title: Device
listItems.description: Limit ad tracking in iOS/Android settings; we respect those choices.

sections.title: Advertising & analytics
paragraphs: We currently partner with PostHog, Google Analytics 4 (consent mode), and Meta Pixels for opted-in campaigns.
Each partner contractually agrees to process data only on our behalf and provide regional opt-outs.

sections.title: Policy updates
paragraphs: We review this policy quarterly or whenever we add a new vendor. Material changes trigger an on-site banner and email notice.
Continuing to use the site after updates signals acceptance of the revised policy.

contact.title: Cookie or consent questions
contact.description: Our privacy desk can help you tailor analytics without losing essential functionality.
